## UseSessionIdSuffix() function

All requests and responses will now use session id suffix for all requests and responses

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function UseSessionIdSuffix(): ClassDecorator;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`ClassDecorator`
